CustomField.description: Handseal Bundle Message in English. Displayed when Handseal_Replacement_Bundles__c > 0, otherwise blank.
CustomField.formula: IF( Handseal_Replacement_Bundles__c > 0, " and " & TEXT(Handseal_Replacement_Bundles__c) & " Bundles of " & Settlement_Goodwill_Replacement_Product__c , "")
CustomField.label: Conga Handseal Bundle Message EN
